tokenomics.title: About Aegis (AEG)
tokenomics.desc: AEG is the native utility and governance token of the Aegis Protocol. Designed on the Base network, it powers the ecosystem through staking rewards, premium access, and decentralized decision-making.
tokenomics.utility_gov_desc: Vote on protocol upgrades and treasury usage.
tokenomics.utility_staking_desc: Earn up to 18.5% APY by securing the network.
tokenomics.utility_security_desc: Access premium audit reports and security tools.

footer.copyright: Â© 2026 Aegis Global Project. Built on Base Mainnet.
footer.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Cryptocurrency investments involve high risk. The simplified visuals (e.g., APY, price targets) are for illustrative purposes only. AEG is a utility token for the Aegis ecosystem. Please do your own research (DYOR) before participating.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: When will I receive my tokens?
faq.a1: Instantly! Our autonomous bot monitors the blockchain 24/7. As soon as your ETH transfer is confirmed, the bot mints and sends AEG tokens to your wallet within seconds.
faq.a2: The Seed Round price is 1 ETH = 23,176 AEG (~$0.00012). The target listing price on Aerodrome is $0.005, offering significant upside for early adopters.
faq.a3: Yes. The Aegis contract follows standard ERC-20 security practices. The source code is verified on BaseScan (0xCFEF...3061d) for full transparency.
faq.q4: How do I add the token to MetaMask?
faq.a4: Open MetaMask, go to 'Import Tokens', and paste our contract address: 0xCFEF8Ee0197E846805Af515412256f24cCE3061d

whitepaper.title: Aegis Protocol Lite Whitepaper
whitepaper.section1_text: Aegis Protocol is a decentralized asset management system built on Base L2. Our mission is to provide a transparent, secure, and high-yield environment for investors through automated strategies and on-chain governance.
whitepaper.section2_text: Total Supply: 1,000,000,000 AEG. Allocation: Presale (20%), Liquidity (15%), Staking Rewards (30%), Ecosystem Fund (20%), Team (10%, vested), Advisors (5%).
whitepaper.section3_text: Smart contracts are audited by independent firms. Liquidity is locked for 12 months. Multi-sig treasury management ensures funds are used strictly for protocol development.
